name: Grandpa Go
description:
Created by Team Phlargenarffen for the 1 month 2016 Summer Awful Jam, the theme was "Games for Grandpa"

Development Note: All Art, Audio, and Code was created from scratch. 

Summary:

Grandpa's got a brand new spring-powered walker, and it's up to you to get him around town. Unfortunately for Grandpa, there are some obstacles in his way. But, his new walker can propel itself dozens of feet into the air! And for some reason, so can he!

Controls:

Click and drag the mouse slingshot-style to get Grandpa going! Make sure not to separate Grandpa from his walker too far, as his old arms can only stretch so far.
